Texto: 
papillodema.
no focal neurologic deficit.
surgical resection
• large complex cerebellar mass with cystic components
• peripheral enhancement of the lesion
• mass effect causing hydrocephalus and cerebellar tonsil herniation
desmoplastic  medulloblastoma
• medulloblastoma, and variants
• ependymoma
• choroid plexus papilloma
• meningioma
2 year old boy with a 2 week history of problems walking (gait ataxia).
1 episode of vomiting the day prior to admission
there are several subtypes of medulloblastoma:
• icd-0 9470/3 medulloblastoma 
• icd-0 9471/3 desmoplastic/nodular medulloblastoma
• icd-0 9471/3 medulloblastoma w/extensive nodularity
• icd-0 9474/3 anaplastic medulloblastoma
• icd-0 9474/3 large cell medulloblastoma
• icd-0 9472/3 medulloblastoma w/myogenic differentiation
• icd-0 9470/3 medulloblastoma w/melantoic differentiation

http://atlasgeneticsoncology.org//tumors/medulloblastomaid5065.html
